de.bpmnaftool.control
Interface BpmnAfTool

All Known Implementing Classes:
BpmnAfToolImpl
public interface BpmnAfTool

This interface and its underlying implementation are used to start the BpmnAfTool, manage all of its functions and delegate user interaction from the view to other controllers.

Author:
Felix Härer

Method Summary
 AristaFlowModel getAristaFlowModel()
          Returns the transformed model.
 BpmnModel getBpmnModel()
          Returns the input model.
 View getView()
          Returns only instance of the view (singleton)
 void initialize()
          Initializes the BpmnAfTool
 void initializeView()
          Starts the graphical user interface and adds an observer
 void log(java.lang.String message, int indent, int lineBreaks)
          Logs the given message with a simple logger, notifies the view (observer) and prints to stout.
 void setInputFile(java.io.File inputFile)
          Sets the given file as input, parses and validates it
 void setOutputFile(java.io.File outputFile)
          Sets the given file as output, sets the log file to outputFile.log
 void transformModel()
          Transforms the model which was set as input and writes it to the file set as output.

transformModel

void transformModel()

log

void log(java.lang.String message,
         int indent,
         int lineBreaks)
Logs the given message with a simple logger, notifies the view (observer) and prints to stout. Indentation and line breaks are added as specified.

Parameters:
message - message to log
indent - level of indentation, from 0 on
lineBreaks - insert given number of line breaks after message
